About Me

Greetings, I’m Ramaraj. I’m a software engineer with 10 years of experience in Mobile Application Development, living in Chennai, India. I am a fan of programming, gaming, and innovation. I’m also interested in technology and reading. I have strong experience in iOS, Android native and Xamarin app development. I am a beginner in Node.js


I possess a sharp eye for detail, which I use to find even the smallest errors in text. I work well under pressure and can produce high-quality work in short periods of time. I have strong interpersonal skills and work with a wide variety of people.

Experience

Trimble Navigation India Pvt Ltd, Chennai

Lead Software Engineer - May 2020 - Till Date

Senior Software Engineer - Nov 2016 - May 2020

Trimble is transforming the way the world works by delivering products and services that connect the physical and digital worlds.

  • Improved the code quality in existing projects
  • Built a internal build distribution system for distributing iOS apps
  • Introduced and practiced Fastlane tool to distribute iOS signing certificates and provisioning files
c# xamarin asp.net core .net core azure devops

Zanec Soft Tech Pvt Ltd, Chennai

Technical Lead - Apr 2014 - Nov 2016

Zanec is a startup doing projects starting from Mobile apps all the way to websites. It partnered with foreign companies and released many own products.

  • Leaded teams ranging from 2 people upto 5 people
  • Built a audio detection framework to work with our custom hardware
  • Built so many POC's
c# xamarin asp.net core .net core azure devops

Rifluxyss softwares Private Ltd, Chennai

Programmer - Nov 2012 - Apr 2014

Junior Programmer - Nov 2011 - Nov 2012

Rifluxyss is a small service based company offering services primarily in mobile application development.

  • Worked with a team of 12 people
  • Introduced Git in the company
  • Ported one of the iOS app into a Mac app
